description: Lists the imports for a bot, bot locale, or custom vocabulary. Imports are kept in the list for 7 days.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Determines the field that the list of imports is sorted by. You can sort by the LastUpdatedDateTime field in ascending or descending order. The export field to use for sorting. The order to sort the list.

nested_params.name: attribute
nested_params.description: The export field to use for sorting.

nested_params.name: order
nested_params.description: The order to sort the list.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Provides the specification of a filter used to limit the bots in the response to only those that match the filter specification. You can only specify one filter and one string to filter on. (dict) --- Filters the response from the ListImports operation. The name of the field to use for filtering. The values to use to filter the response. The values must be Bot, BotLocale, or CustomVocabulary. (string) --- The operator to use for the filter. Specify EQ when the ListImports operation should return only resource types that equal the specified value. Specify CO when the ListImports operation should return resource types that contain the specified value.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the field to use for filtering.

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: The values to use to filter the response. The values must be Bot, BotLocale, or CustomVocabulary.

nested_params.name: operator
nested_params.description: The operator to use for the filter. Specify EQ when the ListImports operation should return only resource types that equal the specified value. Specify CO when the ListImports operation should return resource types that contain the specified value.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: If the response from the ListImports operation contains more results than specified in the maxResults parameter, a token is returned in the response. Use the returned token in the nextToken parameter of a ListImports request to return the next page of results. For a complete set of results, call the ListImports operation until the nextToken returned in the response is null.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier assigned by Amazon Lex to the bot.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot that was imported. It will always be DRAFT.

nested_items.name: importSummaries
nested_items.description: Summary information for the imports that meet the filter criteria specified in the request. The length of the list is specified in the maxResults parameter. If there are more imports available, the nextToken field contains a token to get the next page of results.

nested_items.name: importId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier that Amazon Lex assigned to the import.

nested_items.name: importedResourceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier that Amazon Lex assigned to the imported resource.

nested_items.name: importedResourceName
nested_items.description: The name that you gave the imported resource.

nested_items.name: importStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the resource. When the status is Completed the resource is ready to build.

nested_items.name: mergeStrategy
nested_items.description: The strategy used to merge existing bot or bot locale definitions with the imported definition.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the import was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the import was last updated.

nested_items.name: importedResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of resource that was imported.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates whether there are more results to return in a response to the ListImports operation. If the nextToken field is present, you send the contents as the nextToken parameter of a ListImports operation request to get the next page of results.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The locale specified in the request.
